channel.title: OpticRS || New server! || [PI] || Fun addictive so much to do!
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/577/logolong.png/][IMG]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/1057/logolong.png[/img][/URL]
|| OPTICRS ||
Hi Welcome to OPTICRS Advertisment,
Home page - [url=http://opticrs.net/]http://opticrs.net/[/url] Forums - [url=http://opticrs.net/forums/index.php]http://opticrs.net/forums/index.php[/url] chatbox - [url=http://opticrs.net/chatbox.html]http://opticrs.net/chatbox.html[/url] webclient - [url=http://play.opticrs.net/]http://play.opticrs.net/[/url] download client (zip and rar) - [url=http://opticrs.net/Downloads/OpticRS.zip]http://opticrs.net/Downloads/OpticRS.zip[/url] [url=http://opticrs.net/Downloads/OpticRS.rar]http://opticrs.net/Downloads/OpticRS.rar[/url] standalone client - [url=http://play.opticrs.net/client.jar]http://play.opticrs.net/client.jar[/url]
-every skill working (yes every single one) -vps hosted - friendly staff -laods of minigames! -bossing! we have over 12 bosses! -fun eco :) easy to make cash and train but not too easy -loads of amazing shops -we listen to our players suggestions! -Staff will be needed! -We take great care to our players -more being added every day suggest stuff on forums! and join!

item.title: OpticRS || New server! || [PI] || Fun addictive so much to do!
item.dc:creator: @opticrs opticrs
item.description:
@opticrs wrote:

|| OPTICRS ||

Hi Welcome to OPTICRS Advertisment,

Home page - http://opticrs.net/
Forums - http://opticrs.net/forums/index.php
chatbox - http://opticrs.net/chatbox.html
webclient - http://play.opticrs.net/
download client (zip and rar) -
http://opticrs.net/Downloads/OpticRS.zip
http://opticrs.net/Downloads/OpticRS.rar
standalone client - http://play.opticrs.net/client.jar

-every skill working (yes every single one)
-vps hosted

  • friendly staff
    -laods of minigames!
    -bossing! we have over 12 bosses!
    -fun eco easy to make cash and train but not too easy
    -loads of amazing shops
    -we listen to our players suggestions!
    -Staff will be needed!
    -We take great care to our players
    -more being added every day suggest stuff on forums! and join!


















Owners - Teddy and Rob

Credits to insanityX
We haven’t done much to it.
So don’t flame saying it’s leeched we are adding and fixing things
